price: 18. Bakoyokaka bosembo ata moke te, mpe bakolobelaka yongo ata moke te, mpe bakomona yango ata moke te, mpe bakozongaka na bosembo te.
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
